name: Nicole's Grilled Corn Salad
author: Soup Loving Nicole
summary: If this doesn't scream summer time, I don't know what does. This side dish is light, packed full of fresh veggies, and perfect for your next outdoor BBQ. This gets better as it sits so plan ahead.
ingredients: 4 ears fresh corn, shucked and desilked
directions: Preheat an outdoor grill for medium-high heat
Grill corn for 15 minutes, turning every few minutes
Transfer to a cutting board and let cool for 5 minutes
Cut corn from the cob and place in a large bowl
Add cucumber, cherry tomatoes, cilantro, olive oil, red onion, lime juice, cumin, garlic powder, salt, and pepper; stir to combine
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour before serving
